## Highlights

// TODO

## Installation

```sh 
npm install --save normalize-css-unit
```

## Usage

```js
import normalizeCSSUnit from 'normalize-css-unit';

normalizeCSSUnit(100);
//=> '100px'

normalizeCSSUnit('100rem ');
//=> '100rem'
```
